entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Pointe-à-la-Croix
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:06 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Charlo 12:00 PM AST Wednesday 11 January 2023

Humidity: 59 %

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
